# profanity_substring_filter_list.txt
# List of substrings to filter from generated filenames to avoid accidental offensive or problematic words.
# This list is not exhaustive and should be reviewed/expanded as needed for your use case.

scunthorpe
ass
sex
cum
cunt
fuck
shit
dick
piss
cock
fag
bitch
slut
whore
wank
pussy
twat

bugger
arse
nigger
spic
kike
chink
gook
coon
faggot
homo
tranny
rape

molest

crap
suck
